mapper.insert: INSERT INTO testcase (case_id, case_desc, env_id, url, method, header, cookies, param, body, file, set_id, sql_script, db_id, case_type) VALUES (#{caseId}, #{caseDesc}, #{envId}, #{url}, #{method}, #{header}, #{cookies}, #{param}, #{body}, #{file}, #{setId}, #{sqlScript}, #{dbId}, #{caseType})
mapper.update: update testcase set case_desc = #{caseDesc}, env_id = #{envId}, url = #{url}, method = #{method}, header = #{header}, cookies = #{cookies}, param = #{param}, body = #{body}, file = #{file}, set_id = #{setId}, sql_script = #{sqlScript}, db_id = #{dbId}, case_type = #{caseType} where case_id = #{caseId}
